title._content: Image taken from page 202 of '[Five Years in Damascus ... With travels and researches in Palmyra, Lebanon, and the Hauran.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Five Years in Damascus ... With travels and researches in Palmyra, Lebanon, and the Hauran.]" Author: PORTER, Josias Leslie. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10077.bbb.17." Page: 202 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1870 Publisher: John Murray Edition: Second edition, ... with map and illustrations. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002962650 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
